name: Cowardly Brave
description:
Cowardly Brave is an adventure, first-person, dungeon crawler where the players has to dodge traps and run away from monsters and other creatures.

The story begins when the player is sleeping, without a care in the world, reveling in the conforts of an easy life, filled with nothing but being a sloth, instead of doing something productive or help around the village, he´d rather be a shut-in doing nothing but eat, drink, sleep and fantasize with lascivious toughts of various women . 

One day, the villagers had enough of him and kicked him out of the village, not alowed to set foot back in unless he acomplishes the trials set by the villagers.

The player must complete a set of dungeons with various traps and bosses to obtain the tresure they protect.

Every dungeon will be focused on a natural element(Water, Fire, Air and Earth) and each of them will have different challenges.

The player doesn´t have the possibility to attack, the only way he can fight back is by running away from bosses to lure them into a trap.

If the original creator of a soundtrack/asset/model does not wish for it's work to be in here, it will be immediately removed.
